title: So, uh...I need Solo/Duo queue to come up already, because inactivity warning.
body:
So I launched LoL today and it prompted me to update to the new client, so I did just that, but the new one greeted me with a bit of an issue, as it warned me that I'd decay if I didn't play ranked. I thought that it was being silly, because I played a Ranked match last night, but then I saw this tag.

http://prntscr.com/d84ui2

Apparently the decay is for the Solo/Duo queue, but I cannot play because it isn't available so...Any ETA in the new queue or any word about the decay system being turned off or something?

replies.body: We're in the preseason, so inactivity or decay is actually disabled and nothing would happen.  This information is also available in our [Preseason faq](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231832207-Preseason-FAQ).  Hope that helps clear things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=QvkoNzNY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-16T19:52:33.142+0000)
>
> We're in the preseason, so inactivity or decay is actually disabled and nothing would happen.  This information is also available in our [Preseason faq](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231832207-Preseason-FAQ).  Hope that helps clear things up!

Thank you for the quick answer! Although I suppose I should submit it as a bug that the new launcher gives you a decay warning whereas the old launcher didn't, as in to avoid future confusion.
